title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Control System Optimization: Adaptive Dynamic Programming Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control theory and programming concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Process of learning control system optimization concepts, focusing on language domain applications in a digitally supported environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of adaptive dynamic programming and analyze its relevance to reinforcement learning
